attributes.additional_details:
Sue Rabbitt Roff, a researcher at Dundee University has come up with a proposal, where human kidney donors would be paid cash for donations.

Sue Rabbitt Roff specifically targeted students with her proposal. This concept is unacceptable and should not be approved.

Approval will put vulnerable students and other persons at an increased and unnecessary risk. Not to mention the significant risk involved in living kidney and general organ donation.

There is also the chance of organ rejection by the recipient. Leading to waste of tissue and funds.
